subject: Pro Plus Pedals
description_text:
Hi,

Currently I'm looking on your website to buy some new pedals. At the moment
I'm using the Logitech G923 for iracing, but I think the pedals can be
improved.

I only need a throttle and brake pedal without a baseplate since I want to
create one my own.

What are your cheapest options? And do you have some goos promotion? I live
in the Netherlands.

Looking forward to your advice.

Thanks in advance.

Kind regards,
Joey van der Linden

conversations.body_text: Hi Joey van der Linden,     We recommend our PlusX pedals, which support a dual-pedal setup and come without a baseplate. Please see the link below for more details!   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals?variant=50297651003706
